attachments.title: [ANN] Makie Update: Figures And Integrated Layouts
attachments.text: Hey everybody, For the last months Simon and I have been working on streamlining the integration of MakieLayout in the Makie ecosystem. Now, with AbstractPlotting.jl v0.15, we finally have made some bigger changes to our default plotting pipeline to make the features of MakieLayout more easily accessible and reduce boilerplate by a lot. The biggest change is that where you had to write this before to use MakieLayout’s more powerful axis: scene, layout = layoutscene() ax = layout[1, 1] = LAxis...
